channel.title: Luigi on Coding with Data
channel.description: Recent content in Luigi on Coding with Data

item.title: Creating a Spotify Playlist using Luigi
item.description: pre code, pre, code { white-space: pre !important; overflow-x: scroll !important; word-break: keep-all !important; word-wrap: initial !important; } Introduction In the previous post, I shared an analysis of my Spotify listening history using R. In this post, I will discuss what came before having the data: collecting, cleaning and saving it. As the title suggest, we will even go a step further and automate the creation of a weekly top 10 playlist in Spotify using the very same dataset.
